english_example_sentence: If you had believed this important news, you wouldn't have made a wrong decision.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты поверил этой важной новости, ты бы не принял неправильного решения.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu önemli habere inanmış olsan, yanlış karar vermezdin.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen bu önemli habere ______, yanlış karar vermezdin.
